messages.404: Be present. Stay calm. Move forward.
messages.default: Be present. Stay calm. Move forward.

descriptions.400: Your request wasn't formatted correctly. Take a moment to review it. Mistakes are part of the journey. Adjust and try again.
descriptions.401: You'll need to authenticate to access this. It's a simple step. Take your time. Sign in when you're ready.
descriptions.402: This content requires payment to access. Consider whether it's what you need right now. No pressure, just options.
descriptions.403: Access to this resource is restricted. That's okay. There are other paths to explore. Keep moving forward.
descriptions.404: The page you're looking for doesn't exist. Take a deep breath. It's okay. Sometimes things aren't where we expect them to be.
descriptions.405: That method isn't supported here. No worries. Try a different approach. Flexibility leads to solutions.
descriptions.406: The format you requested isn't available. It happens. Try another format or simply move on. Either way is fine.
descriptions.408: The request took too long and timed out. Slow down. Be patient. Try again when the moment feels right.
descriptions.409: There's a conflict with this request. Conflicts happen. Refresh your perspective and try again with clarity.
descriptions.410: This content is permanently gone. Some things leave and don't come back. Accept it. Find something new.
descriptions.413: Your request payload is too large. Less is often more. Simplify what you're sending and try again.
descriptions.429: You're making too many requests. Slow down. Breathe. There's no rush. The content will be here when you return.
descriptions.500: The server encountered an error. Technical issues happen. Our team is aware. Be patient while we fix it.
descriptions.502: There's an error with the gateway. Sometimes connections fail. It's temporary. Try again in a few moments.
descriptions.503: The service is currently unavailable. Downtime happens. Use this moment to rest. Come back soon.
descriptions.504: The gateway timed out. Connections take time. Be patient. Try reaching out again in a moment.
descriptions.default: The page you're looking for doesn't exist. Take a deep breath. It's okay. Sometimes things aren't where we expect them to be.

footers.404: Breathe in peace, breathe out stress
footers.429: Slow and steady wins the race
footers.default: Breathe in peace, breathe out stress
